teachers.name: Maria

reviews.comment: Maria is an excellent teacher! Very patient and explains everything clearly.
Best Spanish teacher I've ever had!

teachers.lesson_info: Passionate about teaching languages with 8 years of experience
teachers.experience: I've been teaching Spanish and English for 8 years. I have a degree in linguistics and love helping students achieve their language goals.

teachers.name: David

reviews.comment: David makes learning Chinese fun and easy!

teachers.lesson_info: Native Mandarin speaker with experience teaching English
teachers.experience: Native Mandarin speaker with 5 years of teaching experience. I specialize in conversational Chinese and business language.

teachers.name: Sophie

reviews.comment: Sophie is amazing! Her teaching methods are very effective.

teachers.lesson_info: French native speaker specializing in advanced conversation
teachers.experience: Born and raised in Paris, I've been teaching French for 10 years. I focus on natural conversation and cultural context.

teachers.name: Anna

reviews.comment: Very professional and well-prepared for each lesson.
Good teacher, helps a lot with grammar.

teachers.lesson_info: Certified German teacher with focus on grammar and structure
teachers.experience: I'm a certified German teacher with 6 years of experience. I believe in a structured approach to language learning.

teachers.name: Carlos

reviews.comment: Carlos is fantastic! Very engaging and makes learning fun.
Highly recommend! Very patient and encouraging.

teachers.lesson_info: Multilingual teacher passionate about Latin languages
teachers.experience: Native Spanish speaker who also speaks Portuguese and English fluently. I've been teaching for 7 years and love helping students become confident speakers.

teachers.name: Yuki

reviews.comment: Yuki is incredibly patient and knowledgeable. Best Japanese teacher!
Amazing teacher! Makes Japanese grammar easy to understand.

teachers.lesson_info: Native Japanese speaker with expertise in JLPT preparation
teachers.experience: I'm from Tokyo and have been teaching Japanese for 12 years. I specialize in JLPT preparation and can help with both formal and casual Japanese.
